entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
